title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
Power up your Italian adventure with confidence. The VINTAR Type L Italy Travel Power Adapter 3-pack gives you reliable, grounded charging for all your essentials—without the bulk.

Why travelers love it:
- 4-in-1 convenience: Each adapter features 2 American AC outlets plus 2 USB ports (up to 2.4A) to charge phones, tablets, power banks, and more at the same time.
- True grounded safety: 3-prong Type L plug delivers a secure, grounded connection for added protection.
- Worldwide-ready performance: Handles up to 2500W (250V, 10A) for dual-voltage devices (100–250V). Ideal for modern electronics and travel gear.
- Compact and lightweight: Ultra-small footprint (2.8 x 2.6 x 2.3 in) slips easily into any carry-on. With three adapters, you can charge in multiple rooms or share with travel companions.
- Tested and trusted: CE and FCC certified, backed by a 12-month warranty and friendly customer service.

Perfect for: Italy and Type L destinations including Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, and Vatican City.

Important note: This is not a voltage converter. For high-powered appliances (like hair dryers without dual voltage), ensure your device supports 100–250V dual voltage or use a proper converter.

Stay connected, travel lighter, and charge smarter—wherever your Italian itinerary takes you.
